summary: The nationality of a person is that person's legal relationship with a state, for example a Swedish person's legal relationship with the kingdom of Sweden.
full_text:
In law, statelessness is the lack of any nationality, or the absence of a recognized link between an individual and any state.
A stateless person is defined as someone who is "not considered as a national by any state under the operation of its law". Some but not all stateless persons are also refugees, not all asylum seekers are stateless and many persons who are stateless have never crossed an international border.
title: Statelessness
